name: Alberto Donado Rodríguez
body:
## Resume
A motivated and enthusiastic Telecomunications & Computer engineer with post graduate experience in electronic area. Strong understanding of design methodologies and design issues, having worked in Aerospace projects developing digital systems based on FPGA for companys like Airbus, Thales Alenia Space, Astrium, CRISA and HV Systems.

***

## Education and Training
### MEng Telecommunications engineer 

_(October 2006 – November 2012)_
Universidad Rey Juan Carlos, (Spain) 



### BEng Computer systems engineer 
_(October 2007 – November 2012)_
Universidad Rey Juan Carlos, (Spain)

***

## Work Experience

### HV Sistemas
Hardware / Firmware engineer (October 2012 – Present)

Aerospace Projects for Airbus, Thales Alenia Space, Astrium and CRISA
* Develop digital systems based on FPGA
* VHDL, C and C++
* Electrical Ground Support Equipment (EGSE)
* Altium electronic design
* ISO 9100 certification

### Thales Alenia Space 
Hardware engineer (May 2012 – September 2012)

Project SeoSat/Ingenio (Scientific Earth Observation Satellite)
* PCB design, validation and test

### AKCELWARE SL
Hardware / Firmware engineer (June 2011 – September 2012 )

Develop IP CORE CAN 2.0
* FPGA Spartan 3A
* Coding, simulation and implementation
* ChipScope Pro testbench
